import React,{useState} from 'react' import DropDown from '../Button/DropDown' import Update from '../Button/Update'; import Week from '../Button/Week'; import WeeklyUpdate from '../WeeklyForm/WeeklyUpdate'; import './ForUpdate.scss'; const ForUpdate = () => { const count=0 const[shownOff,setShownOff]=useState(false); const[weeklyUpdate,setWeeklyUpdate] = useState(count) const filterMethod=()=>{ setWeeklyUpdate(count+1) console.log("weeklyUpdate"); } console.log("MOnth",weeklyUpdate); return (
) } export default ForUpdate;
